GENERAL.REVERSE SORT TIP: Reverse the sort order of the list

HITS.NB HITS WARNING TXT: now showing {{nbHitsShown}} of {{nbHits}}. This operation can be a bit slow. Please be patient!
HITS.ORDERS REPORT TIP: A report with all the {{nbHits}} hit(s) will be downloaded. Deleted orders will be added at the end of the file.
HITS.OTPS REPORT TIP: A report with all the {{nbHits}} hit(s) will be downloaded. Blocked/Deleted otps will be added at the end of the file.
HITS.PRODUCTS REPORT TIP: A report with all the {{nbHits}} hit(s) will be downloaded. Blocked products will be added at the end of the file.
HITS.NO HIT TEXT: No {{param}} yet in the database for this query

SEARCH HELP.COMPLEX QUERIES: Complex queries can be done by using 'and', 'or', 'not' (see examples below)
SEARCH HELP.EXPLAINED COMPLEXQUERY TIP: This shows how the 'and', 'or', 'not' keywords will be interpreted in your search query. Keyword 'not' has a higher associative precedence than 'and' which in turn has a higher precedence than 'or'

COMMENTS.TAB TITLE TIP: Here there are probably messages waiting that have explicitely been addressed to you
COMMENTS.PRIVATE COMMENTS MSG: There are messages here which have been specifically addressed to you.
COMMENTS.PRIVATE COMMENTS TIP: Click here, if you have read all relevant messages.
COMMENTS.NOTIFY USERS TIP: Optional: Use this to attract attention of one of serveral users regarding your new message. Please use this only if necessary.
COMMENTS.ATTRACT ATTENTION TO OBJECT MSG: You have been asked to have a look at the comments of an object.

ACTION.CLICK HERE TO GET A DETAIL VIEW: Click here to get a detail view
ACTION.CLICK HERE TO GO BACK TO LAST VIEW: Click here to go back to last view

CHECKBOX DELETE.CAREFUL THIS WILL: Careful! This will delete the selected
CHECKBOX DELETE.IF YOU ARE SURE: and can't be undone. Click here if you are sure you want to delete it.

ACTION BUTTON.ARE YOU SURE: Are you sure you want to do that? If yes, click the button below.

KRINO.GREEK: I judge, I decide, I think good

CARD TEXT.KRINO WILL SHOW HERE: Krino will show here to the user how the spending of his team is in relation to his allowed budget.

LABO.TIP:
You are in labo {{param}}.
(Click to change the labo)

BASKET.TIP:
Click here to
open your basket

ERROR.NO LOGIN: sorry: you are not logged in

WARNING.REPEATS AFTER WARNING: number of repeats after first warning:
WARNING.DAYS WAIT REPEAT: number of days to wait before repeat:

LABEL.HOW MUCH WISH SPEND: how much money you wish to spend:

LABEL.DEPENSE POUR LA PERIODE: total spending desired at claim date

MSG.CREANCE ERROR: There was an error: a spending amount at a later date must always be superior to an earlier one! Also it must be less than the available budget for that period.

LABEL.CANNOT TRANSPORT COSTS: otp cannot be used for transport costs

SEARCH HELP.MSG1: RWAL: if the OTP, its classification or the associated project contains 'RWAL'
SEARCH HELP.MSG5: #LI: if the OTP is reserved for the use of the owning project
SEARCH HELP.MSG6: #NL: if the OTP is open for all and thus NOT reserved for the use of the owning project
SEARCH HELP.MSG7: #P0: if the OTP has no priority/priority=0 set (those otps will never be chosen)
SEARCH HELP.MSG8: #OK: if the OTP is OK, and could be chosen, provided that the dates and budget are adequate. (neither deleted, nor blocked, nor closed, nor priority 0)
SEARCH HELP.MSG9: #NO: if the OTP can't be chosen (blocked or closed or priority 0)
SEARCH HELP.MSG10: #CR: if the OTP has a coming claim date

HELP.ALLOWED CHANGE OTP TIP: For advanced users who are aware of their Otps. They can only select valid Otps.
HELP.SUPER ADMINISTRATOR: A super administrator has the right to change public data (products, ...) and to create a new labo. Use this with caution please!!

SEARCH HELP.MSG1: john: if the user's name contains 'john'

LABEL.NAME: name:
LABEL.USER IS NOT ALLOWED TO ORDER PRODUCTS: user is not allowed to order products:
LABEL.ALLOWED CHANGE OTP: user is allowed to change the Otp in shopping basket:

MSG.EPROC INTRO: In order to shop at {{param}}  with e-procurement, please fill this form as exacty as possible and wait for the OK before you pass the order on e-procurement. If you get an OK, then feel free to pass your order via e-procurement, and then finally submit this form by pushing the button below.
MSG.EPROC BUTTON: I have passed the order on e-procurement
MSG.YOUR WEB PURCHASE HAS BEEN REGISTERED: Your web purchase has been registered
MSG.USE FOLLOWING PURCHASE ID: Please use following purchase id on web portal of the supplier:
MSG.FILL THIS FORM WEBSHOPPING: Fill this form adequately and you will get the Sap Id that you need in order to place your order on the {{supplier}} webshopping platform.
MSG.THE INFORMATION ENTERED WEBSHOPPING IS C: The information I have entered here is correct and correspond to what I have entered on the {{supplier}} website.

SEARCH HELP.MSG1: bru: the supplier's name, SAP id, city, or country should contain the string 'bru'
SEARCH HELP.MSG4: $w: the supplier is web shopping enabled
SEARCH HELP.MSG5: $c: the supplier has fix costs entered
SEARCH HELP.MSG6: $ep: the supplier is a e-procurement supplier
SEARCH HELP.MSG7: 04897: the sap ID of the supplier contains '04897

LABEL.TOTAL PRICE OF WEB SHOPPING PHOLDER: total price of web shopping (with VAT)

LABEL.MAY ENCODING NUMBER: may need encoding of lot number

ACTIONS.ACCEPTER VALIDATION TIP: Don't forget to activate the product before. If you are super administrator you can also make the product public (non labo specific)
ACTIONS.REFUSER VALIDATION TIP: In this case DON'T activate the product before.
ACTIONS.REFUSER VALIDATION MSG: The creation of one of your product has been refused.
ACTIONS.REASK VALIDATION TIP: Be sure that you delivered the requested information before re-asking for validation. Read the comments in the Comments tab, if you are unsure
ACTIONS.REFUSER VALIDATION MODAL TITLE: Refuse the validation of the product
ACTIONS.REFUSER VALIDATION MODAL FOOTER: Explain why you are refusing the validation. Adding the comment will perform the validation. Otherwise cancel with the cross in the header.
ACTIONS.REASK VALIDATION MODAL TITLE: Ask (maybe again) for the validation of the product
ACTIONS.REASK VALIDATION MODAL FOOTER: Explain what changed that makes you ask again for validation. Adding the comment will issue the request. Otherwise cancel with the cross in the header.
ACTIONS.SET AS NOT URGENT TIP: By clicking here, you declare that your purchase is NOT URGENT and that it can be GROUPED with other's user purchase. This will reduce the global transport costs. Contact your lab manager for more info.
ACTIONS.CHOOSE OTP TITLE: You can change the OTP for '{{product}}' by clicking on one of the otp below
ACTIONS.CLICK HERE ORDER PRODUCT FROM FRIDGE: Click here to order this product from the fridge.
ACTIONS.CLICK HERE TO ADD PRODUCT:
Click here to
add one unity of this product
into the basket.
Click and wait for a second to update!

HELP.DUPLICATE CATALOG NR MENU TIP: Here you can see the other products with the same catalog number.
HELP.CHOOSE OTP TIP: You can choose an other Otp by clicking here

SEARCH HELP.MSG1: liquid : if the product or the supplier contains the string 'liquid'
SEARCH HELP.MSG2: $ >200 : if the price is higher than 200 euros
SEARCH HELP.MSG3: $ <50 : if the price is lower than 50 euros
SEARCH HELP.MSG5: $S/ : product that might be found in the stock
SEARCH HELP.MSG6: $S/tip : stock product that includes 'tip' in the name
SEARCH HELP.MSG9: $M : product presents several times with the same CatalogNr
SEARCH HELP.MSG11: $PR : private products (can be seen only by this labo)
SEARCH HELP.MSG12: $PU : public products (can be seen by all labo)
SEARCH HELP.MSG14: $OR : products that already have been ordered
SEARCH HELP.MSG15: $FR : products that are in the fridge

LABEL.ORDER PRODUCT FROM FRIDGE: Order a product from the fridge

SEARCH HELP.MSG1: RWAL: if the name of the project contains 'RWAL'
SEARCH HELP.MSG2: RWAL: if the name of the group of  projects contains 'RWAL'

SEARCH HELP.MSG1: tip: the product's name, supplier or catalog Nr contains the string 'tip'
SEARCH HELP.MSG2: john: the order has been made by a user or a project team containing 'john'
SEARCH HELP.MSG3: tip: the product ordered (or its catalog number) contains 'tip'

LABEL.WHY WE CHANGE QUANTITY: why do we change the quantity:

HELP.NEW VOUCHERS: Here you can order new vouchers from your Lab Manager. You can also use one of your voucher to place an order on your webshopping platform.

BASKET.USE THE EQUIPE OF THE USER: no, use the project of the current user
BASKET.NO EQUIPE MSG: You cannot pass order, as you entered without selecting a project team. Please login again!
BASKET.NOT ENOUGH BUDGET MSG: Sorry, you don't have enough budget available
BASKET.OTP PROBLEM MSG: Sorry, there is an Otp problem. Contact your administrator!
BASKET.OVER LIMIT MSG: Sorry, you are over the maximal limit for an order. Contact your administrator!
BASKET.ALL DISABLED MSG: All products that you have in your basket are disabled. You can't pass such an order!

SEARCH HELP.MSG1: nadi: order that contains 'nadi' either in the supplier name or the order number or the status or the user/project that issued the order
SEARCH HELP.MSG3: $>200: if the spent amount is higher than 200 euros
SEARCH HELP.MSG11: $<50: if the spent amount is lower than 50 euros
SEARCH HELP.MSG4: #co: orders with comments from krino users
SEARCH HELP.MSG5: #nd: orders not delivered (buy maybe partially delivered)
SEARCH HELP.MSG6: #zd: orders with zero delivery (no delivery at all)
SEARCH HELP.MSG10: #>5: orders with at least 5 order lines
SEARCH HELP.MSG13: #2755: orders having a catalog number containing '2755'

SEARCH HELP.MSG2: vwr: if the supplier name contains 'vwr'
SEARCH HELP.MSG5: $t: finished: with final invoice or reserved amount = 0
SEARCH HELP.MSG8: $pTB: accounting documents without purchase request of type TB
SEARCH HELP.MSG9: $EO: having an otp error: different otps in the same accounting item
SEARCH HELP.MSG10: $E>200: residual reserved amount higher than 200 euros
SEARCH HELP.MSG11: $E <10: residual reserved amount less than à 10 euros
SEARCH HELP.MSG14: #>2: number of accounting items less than 2
SEARCH HELP.MSG15: # <5: number of accounting items higher than 5
